website_summaries.verdict: A fast-acting serum that brightens and smooths skin using bio-available Vitamin C.
pros: Anti-aging serum uses bio-available Vitamin C to renew skin
Users report this serum helps to fade dark spots and even skin tone
cons: Questions about whether the formula is truly organic
A few users experienced skin breakouts

customer_reviews.title: TOXIC INGREDIENT
customer_reviews.text: TOXIC INGREDIENT! PLEASE READ. This is NOT an organic product. It contains phenoxyethanol which is a toxic chemical used in a lot of cosmetics. Please, please do a quick search on the internet, and you will not want to buy this product. I'm glad I found out after a week of using it versus year(s). Many vitamin c serums contain this unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This really works - and fast!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using vitamin c serum with hyaluronic acid for over five years now. It lightened my skin and got rid of the dark areas in a few days. I put moisturizer on my face after I use it every morning. Also my elbows were very dark. I put this serum on my elbows and my elbows were lightened in 3 days! I love this stuff. I'm glad I found it on the internet.
customer_reviews.author: jeanne

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for a week now with my derma roller. I’m so impressed with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Joleen

customer_reviews.title: Not organic, contains the toxin Japan banned - Phenoxyethanol
customer_reviews.text: This is not organic, it has Phenoxyethanol which is a toxic ingredient that was banned in all Japan cosmetics. I'm returning it today. Somehow I missed it, usually they place this ingredient at the end of the list but this company decided to put it in the middle of the list. I refuse to put anything on my skin that is toxic like this. You really should be more honorable with your products, marketing your products as organic and natural when they are not, will bite you in the ass eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna M

customer_reviews.title: Loving the skin I am in
customer_reviews.text: Simply using this product I have gotten into the habit of taking better care of my face. My skin tone looks better and my face feels better. Will continue to use!
customer_reviews.author: Amber May

customer_reviews.title: Works like magic!
customer_reviews.text: Don't know how I found this serum on Amazon but I'm glad I did. I usually have random breakouts on my face and this really helped. I've been using for less than 3 weeks and although it hasn't completely smoothed my face, it has certainly made a hugeeee difference. I apply twice a day- morning and bedtime, after washing my face. It gives my face such a smooth and cleansed feeling!! The sweet and thoughtful follow ups from the seller is another reason why i love this product. Loyal customer henceforth. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Kosi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product. I've been using for 3 weeks and ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. I've been using for 3 weeks and my skin has changed dramatically. My dark spots are almost gone and no bumps on my face . Skin feels extremely smooth. My natural skin has a glow . I order 3 more bottles as gifts for friends and family. Everyone loves it
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin

customer_reviews.title: I love how it makes my skin feel and how it ...
customer_reviews.text: Many Vitamin C products can be goopy or sticky, but this is one by Amara is not. Amara's Vitamin C Serum readily absorbs into my just washed skin without a sticky residue, so I know my skin is actually getting the vitamin C! I love how it makes my skin feel and how it is making the pigmentation fade. I've had trouble with stubborn spots reappearing when Spring/Summer come around, buts since I've started using this product there has been no return of stubborn hyper-pigmentation. I turned 60 this year and it seems the products I need as I get older have to be incredible, but to get such products for a wonderful price is icing on the cake!
customer_reviews.author: Sue O.

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because of the great reviews but have been using this in the AM and PM every day for the last 2 weeks and there have been no improvements in my skin. Was skeptical when I noticed a misspelling and grammatical errors on the label. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Kiersten Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken. Multiple glass shards. 0 product left in bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Doornbos

customer_reviews.title: Cause of my Breakout
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for this product but after trying for a few days, I quickly realized it was the cause of my breakout. Didn't even help brighten my skin or anything, just caused my usually controlled acne to go crazy. Don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Organic!
customer_reviews.text: Very misleading. Product presented as organic but contains many ingredients that are DEFINITELY not organic.
customer_reviews.author: LeisureMan

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product, but it was rather disappointing. I have used and very much liked other vitamin C serums, but liked the idea of using an all organic product on my skin, so I tried this serum. But it's actually not a serum: It looks and feels like water, and as such is rather wasteful as much of it is running down my arm instead of ending up on my skin. I have used it for about 6 weeks and have not noticed any difference. I will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: H. Perotto

customer_reviews.title: Didn't suit me, made me break out
customer_reviews.text: Made me broke out. Tried multiple times after some gap of days in between to make sure it's this, as my skin is really sensitive and even a dirty pillow case can make it break out. Didn't believe it can have this effect since it has such great reviews. Made my skin dull too.
customer_reviews.author: Mehrunissa

customer_reviews.title: Not for large pores or problem skin!
customer_reviews.text: This clogged the heck out of my pores! I can’t use moisturizers because I have large pores that clog easily. I saw all the good reviews but sadly this is like a lot of products that are made for people who already have nice or at least normal skin. I looked in the mirror after 3 days of using and my skin just looked sooo congested and clogged everywhere. Threw this in the garbage and put biore strips all over and steamed my face. I bought another serum from this brand because if great reviews and tossed it as well- If you have oily large pore and problem skin stay away from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: AnnettenMila

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I started to use this at night before I put on my moisturizer. I’m 62 and take pretty good care of my skin. I don’t do facials or other skin treatments but use a good bit of facial products in the Skin Medica line. This is a nice complement. I have a little rosacea and this seems to help. This is reasonably priced compared to other high end C serums.
customer_reviews.author: SUZANNE K MOORE

customer_reviews.title: Organic Product has only a few organic ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this Organic facial product that only contains a few organic ingredients, not entirely. I really want to return it when I learned its ingredient (also contains preservative, it shouldn't in organic product) after the Thanksgiving Holiday. However, Amazon's bad return policy has prevented me to return this product to the seller
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product now for about 3 months and I keep getting comments about how young it's making my skin. It really works. I layer it under my regular moisturizer and I can honestly say that I have seen the difference in my skin. I recommend this to everyone to who asks me and for anyone who wants to know how it works. This is not a sponsored review, I just really like this product, I hope they keep the standard.
customer_reviews.author: Mzgooch

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I used this for three weeks and it actually undid the progress I was making using a non-organic version. I bought it thinking it was a smart alternative, but it just did not perform for me, and I was really hoping it would. Hyaluronic acid definitely plumps up the skin, but the vehicle for absorption is important, and this just didn't have what my skin needs for good absorption. Your skin may respond differently. But for my money, I'm sticking with the companies who have proven demonstrable results. While they may not be 100% organic, I need results and have to use the products that produce them, otherwise I'm wasting my money.
customer_reviews.author: Al N

customer_reviews.title: NO Fragrance?  Not true for the moisturizer!!!
customer_reviews.text: Trying to write a review for the MOISTURIZER, but since I bought 3 items from this line I cant figure out how to do it. The description for the moisturizer says "no dyes, parabens or fragrance". The Moisturizer smells like "half-dead roses" and is so offensive that I sent back ALL THREE items I ordered from this company. If it says NO FRAGRANCE I want that to be true. If you can stand the smell then good luck. I have NO idea if the stuff works cause I had to wash it off!
customer_reviews.author: VA Critic

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for about three weeks. Shipping, packaging and delivery were timely and without difficulty. I enjoy using it and when purchased, I received a detailed email telling me how to use it. It is more of a preventive product per my aesthetician, but obviously others have had real improvement from it. I like to use a facial mineral spray first, which makes the serum easier to spread on my face. I will continue to use it and update if I see noticeable changes. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: TX customer 9876

customer_reviews.title: OK, but no discernible improvement
customer_reviews.text: This serum is light, and easy to apply, takes 2-3 drops for my entire face (Not too close to eyes). Although it feels good, after having conducted Many skincare experiments with Before-After photos to confirm any changes, this one failed to make a discernible improvement in texture or pigmentation, but does seem to improve hydration a little. I will use this product until gone, but won't reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Cathleen

customer_reviews.title: Made me break out more than I’ve ever experienced
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it!! It’s been about a month of use and definitely notice a difference! My skin has been “purging” for a month now so will update after the full 6 weeks they recommend. Will keep in my skincare regime if all’s well! Update after 8 weeks of use: my skin has never been worse. Hard to say if it was the product or my skin not liking it. But I have never had the issue with other Vitamin C. Kind of disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: KNICOLE

customer_reviews.title: Made me break out
customer_reviews.text: Sorry, I really wanted to like it because it had such great reviews and is an awesome price, but it made me break out. To be fair, pretty much everything makes me break out (even at 43). On the plus side, it went on nicely, didn't feel sticky or greasy, and didn't have a smell. Would probably be fine for someone who isn't super acne-prone.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: It took a while, but the serum has been very beneficial. It's not a miracle product, but it definitely helped my complexion I've the course of about 1.5 months of almost daily use. (How I use it daily: After I was my face in the evening, I apply my toner, the serum, a spot treatment, and then my moisturizer.) My skin is softer, more hydrated, and my acne heals faster and leaves far less scarring than before. I also break out less than before. The consistency is very liquidy and feels lovely on the skin. I am very pleased and I would definitely be down to try other products from this brand. Yes, I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Maylee

customer_reviews.title: Absorbs too fast...
customer_reviews.text: It absorbs so fast that by the time you put a few drops in your palm and are ready to spread it on your face, it already absorbs into your palm. I have to use at least 15 drops to be able to really get the product fully cover my face. I feel like I have to be lightening fast to apply this serum. Taking care of my skin shouldn't be this intense. I'm asking for money back and not gonna use it anymore, too stressful.
customer_reviews.author: fi66fi

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product religiously after derma-needling and cleaning my face each night (the bottle is almost empty) and I haven’t noticed a darn difference in my skin tone at all. I’ve used other (and even cheaper) vitamin C serums that have shown better results. You could say I’m a skin care addict and this just will not be part of my repertoire. The reviews made it sound so enticing, and I was so excited to try it - but it’s quite the disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: PurpleSunshine

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful serum. I purchased this particular vitamin see serum after a previous one just sat on my face leaving it sticky. This serum absorbs wonderfully into the skin, and it has helped fade some light wrinkles and deep scaring. I would recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Elane Chan

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love
customer_reviews.text: OUTSTANDING!! After only 2 weeks of using the Vitamin C Serum I saw visual results. My face was smoother and the worry lines on my forehead had diminish considerably. Several comments state the Serum is sticky; don't be stingy; I use 1/2 a stopper and dip my finger in the serum and apply. For the price, you don't have to use the serum sparingly. Be generous, your face will thank you, and the extra can be rubbed on the back of your hands with fantastic results.
customer_reviews.author: April M. Kohler

customer_reviews.title: Great for Sun Spots!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try this for the moisturization and hopefully lessen wrinkles. It has worked GREAT for sun spots. I had used another expensive brand that helped but this reduced the spots even more!! That was amazing!! But as for wrinkles, welI I think it would work better on younger skin, less wrinkles. Or maybe I need to use longer and more often. I've been using it about 3 months, once a day. Overall very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: junebug

customer_reviews.title: Consistency was very watery which made me feel like I needed to use more
customer_reviews.text: Consistency was very watery which made me feel like I needed to use more. I have used other serums that make me feel like one drop is enough. Within 2 days I had fully broken out all over my face. I stopped using it and my face is clearing up. Very disappointed. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna DuCharme

customer_reviews.title: An Aesthetician recommended skin ceuticals vitamin C serum
customer_reviews.text: An Aesthetician recommended skin ceuticals vitamin C serum, I bought this instead as it's paraben free and at a much better price point. I just started using it and my skin looks and feels better already, lighter, tighter, brighter. It's a clear liquid with no scent and feels good on my aging skin. This is a real find for me! I'm going to try some of Amara's other products too.
customer_reviews.author: elle

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Great Company!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I love more than this product is the company I get it from, Amara Organics. I was surprised when I learned that they were a family based company- the level of customer service and quality of care had me picturing a large ordination with several employees for sure prompt responses. Most people don't know but vit C and Hyaluronic Acid is an AMAZING primer/base for makeup- will also improve the skin tremendously!! I strongly recommend this product and anything from this company. Thank you for making my on-line experience SO great! :)
customer_reviews.author: K M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent serum
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this vitamin c serum every morning for about a year and it has definitely improved my skin. I tend to be fickle and rarely rebuy the same skin product more then once or twice. I have become loyal to this one. I am 45 yrs and started seeing brown 'sun spots' and fine lines appearing on my face. Although this serum has not made my existing imperfections magically disappear, I do believe it has helped prevent more from forming. I have tried expensive products from my dermatologist. This serum seems to work just as well, if not better. One bottle lasts me several months making it much more affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Marlo

customer_reviews.title: Makes your skin soft and glowy!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I went through this entire bottle before reviewing! After changing my facial cleanser and adding this into my nightly routine, my acne and scarring has dramatically decreased. Make sure you finish the entire bottle before expecting results, as I didn't see results until 3/4 done. Also make sure to apply it while the skin is still wet. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My skin is clearer and I have noticed a decrease in wrinkles. Update: I have ordered this two more times, one for myself and one for my best friend. I love this product. If I go out of town for a few days without it I notice a difference in my skin. Swear by it.
customer_reviews.author: MicheleR

customer_reviews.title: Best decision I've made for my skin, in conjunction with my favorite cleanser
customer_reviews.text: In combination with Block Island Organics Purifying Facial Cleanser, this is the best decision I have ever made for my skin. I have lived in both dry and humid climates, and this Serum has worked. I have dry/oily/combination skin, mostly in the "T-Zone", and this serum has postively changed my skin for the better. Of course, every now and then stress and certain types of foods cause blemishes on my skin. But this serum has not caused any issues. I am so happy. Only "issue": remember, a little bit of this product on your face goes a long way! Don't put a lot on. Do a drop and add more if you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Erica A

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: You need this serum!!! As an esthetician I am extremely picky about skin care products and with so many subpar products on the market I was a tad dubious as to the efficacy of such a reasonably priced serum. To my surprise, this Vitamin C serum is the bomb! Not sticky, no stinging, hydates without leaving a film. After 3 months of daily use I began to notice lightening of a few darker spots on my face, definite glow to my skin. After a full 6 months I am so happy with the results that I have begun recommending it to my clients. Not only have I reordered the serum , I will be trying more of the products.
customer_reviews.author: Madigan Holohan

customer_reviews.title: Vitamin C Serum Help for Older Skin
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering, and using this product for several months now. I might add that I am older so I will take all the help I can get. When I first began using this, I could tell an immediate difference in my skin. This product is touted for tightening skin and reducing pores, among other benefits. The only complaint I would have is not having the option to buy it in a larger bottle. Another note regarding customer service. They are GREAT to check in via e-mail and ask if you are satisfied with the product or if you have any issues. We know customer service is at the top of our list when shopping online.
customer_reviews.author: Wandagail

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: Can’t find much good to say about this. I got it on a daily deal. It seems greasy on my skin. Not at all good for large pores, like I have. Seems to irritate my skin more than help it. I have sensitive skin, and do not believe this is helping me at all. I just don’t like adding oil to my face. Doesn’t do anything for me. I’ll probably end up throwing this away.
customer_reviews.author: Trakbak

customer_reviews.title: Plant Powered Beauty
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty particular about what i eat, and the products i use to clean around my home, as well as every product i use on my hair, skin, and clothing. I had a difficult time finding a serum for my face care routine that was as close to organic as possible, plant based, and effective. But i must say i have received many compliments on the clarity of my skin while using this skin care line. I absolutely this serum and many other Amara Organics products. I would recommend using their moisturizer after this serum to achieve maximum effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: WildWiseWitch

customer_reviews.title: Tried and true
customer_reviews.text: This vitamin c serum is great to have in your skin care routine. I’ve been using this product for years. If you are new to vitamin c products I would give it a try and see how it goes. I’ve been using the serums before they were popular. Do not buy over hyped vitamin c. Do some research on ingredients if you know how your skin reacts certain ingredients before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kenyata Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great for my skin
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted to give some feedback on the Vitamin C product. I’ve been using it a week now and I’ve already received compliments on my skin. My mother and boyfriend both mentioned that my complexion looks smoother and healthier. I’ve also started using a derma roller around the same time. The serum feels great! It adds enough moisture and doesn’t feel sticky. I’ve used other serums and it would leave a sticky feel on my face. Your product is great to wear under a face cream. I have a mix of dry and slightly oily skin in certain areas. My face feels really great with your serum!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Game changer! My skin absolutely glows and is dare I say nearly flawless with the addition of this Vit C serum. Reduction in my light sun spots as well. Couldn’t recommend this product more! I tell Everyone about it!
customer_reviews.author: AProfessionalAmateur

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: The first time I ever ordered this product got beautiful results. My husband was commenting on my face daily, how bright and clear my complexion was. Time had lapsed before ordering this bottle. I been using it for awhile now and have said nothing. I noticed the product is not as good as before. I had ordered a bottle from a Vendor in Arizona and this bottle was the same, no results. I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: My Happy Reader

customer_reviews.title: Love this serum
customer_reviews.text: Great serum. I use this every day. I have always had oily skin but it is now starting to get dry and this works great for me most days as moisturizer on its own. When needed a I had the Amara lotion. Great products. No breakouts either.
customer_reviews.author: Liza Corbett

customer_reviews.title: No harmful ingredients and works great
customer_reviews.text: I love this product so much! Its hard to find skin care products that are all natural with no bad ingredients in it and this one is the one I'll continue to buy. I read lots of reviews and I DON'T listen to those who say it smells bad!! Well that's due to the purity of the ingredients and no harmful "fragrances" added to them. I was definitely willing to take a gamble w this product especially because IMO it's not expensive at all!
customer_reviews.author: MistyD

customer_reviews.title: Break out!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. I usually use $80+ bottles of vitamin c serum but i decided to be more cost effective and this product advertised as organic. I figured i give it a try! The serum feels like water, it runs down my face. The worst part is the serum actually caused me to breakout. It appears that it clogged my pores really badly. I started using it for about a month and started breaking out on my eyebrows(I’m guessing it’s clogging my hair follicles) and extreme whitehead around my nose. Would never purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Very Good! Recommend, but returning to a 25% solution. 💋
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fluidity and easy coverage. Great stuff really kept my skin hydrated when used with tbe other products in this line. I am returning to a stronger 25% solution. Otherwise it does as claimed regarding hydration. The 25% solutions seem to do a better job of taming the freckles on my jawline.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Miracle skin serum! -Freckles even shrink!!!!
customer_reviews.text: For years I have been battling darkspots, dry skin, peeling, flaking, plus adult acne, on my face and neck. I just bought my second bottle. Wow!!! Should be called "Miracle skin serum". My face cleared up within a week! After washing, I put it directly on my face then added my moisturizer -fantastic! I have freckles and it seemed to make them smaller as well. Love this serum!!
customer_reviews.author: MiraMae

customer_reviews.title: I have been using the night serum and it activates my skin as using retinal alone and sure like it and been using it for over a year ...
customer_reviews.text: At my age I tried so many serums and creams are on the market that are very expensive. I have been using the night serum and it activates my skin as using retinal alone and sure like it and been using it for over a year and love the results So I wanted to try this daytime serum and I will tell you that I like it better than the product I used for over $100.oo. I am going to continue to use this product because it works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Haigohe Miller

customer_reviews.title: SO disappointed in the poor quality of this serum
customer_reviews.text: Broke me out with peri oral dermatitis within a week of nightly usage. Ended up spending a small fortune on meds from dermatologist almost a month ago and my face is only partially cleared up. SO disappointed in the poor quality of this serum. DO NOT PURCHASE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Adewallen Ma

customer_reviews.title: Great service!
customer_reviews.text: I have subscribed to receiving this product monthly for at least 18 months. I use a little less than 1/2 a dropper twice a day, every day. Initially, I had issues with dark patches but after using this product, I no longer have that issue. The product usually lasts a couple of days past the time I receive the next monthly order. This month it ran out about a week earlier than usual. I contacted Amara as I knew from experience this was unusual. They responded immediately and made good on their product; this left me a very happy customer! I don't usually do reviews but I love this product and company.
customer_reviews.author: LuckyDee

customer_reviews.title: instant effect lasts for 3-4 hours
customer_reviews.text: it has an instant effect, wonderful action. I am a 42 y/o lady suffering from dryness and some fine wrinkles, this product made my face hydrated and 6 years younger look especially around cheeks and chin area, but it doesn't last for the whole day for ladies in 40s should be applied 3 times daily to keep up that glamor, yes I recommend it very much
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great company
customer_reviews.text: The serum arrived quickly and was accompanied by a very warm email from Jennifer Thompson, the co-founder, wanting to make sure that I got the serum with no problems and asking me to let her know if I had any problems or questions.i did ask som questions about its use, which she answered quickly and cheerfully. I like the product; it goes on well and seems to be helping, although I haven’t used it often enough or for long enough to really assess its effectiveness. I would not hesitate to do business with Amara again or recommend them to others, just on the basis of their customer support and attention thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Light and hydrating
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty pleased with this - I'm using it as part of my new skin regimen in the morning, after a different moisturizer and before my acne prevention cream and makeup. It's light, doesn't have much of an odor, and a few drops cover the whole face. My skin is looking great at the moment, so I'll stick with it.
customer_reviews.author: SBPTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! I've been using this product for only a month, but I'm starting to see a bit of fading of age spots on my face. I realize that this process takes a long time, but I'm willing to wait for the results. My skin feels very soft and smooth using this Vtamin C Serum, so I'm giving them 5 stars and will continue to use it. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: cj hart

customer_reviews.title: I tried a different Vitamin C serum than I had ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried a different Vitamin C serum than I had been using. This one is ok, but I do not feel the slight tingle that I have felt with the other Vitamin C serum I was using. I can also see that my pores are increasing in size again. Thankfully, the bottle started going pale yellow early. So I threw it away and bought the kind I originally used.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This serum is so lightweight and feels like you put water on your skin. But I have definitely noticed a difference with the overall clarity of my skin. I have less redness and hyperpigmentation after using it for about 3 weeks. The bottle seems to be lasting me a good time, too, since it barely looks like I've used any at all. I love that it comes in a dark glass bottle, since that helps the vitamin c stay as potent as possible. Overall, I really love this product! Will definitely purchase again when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Courteney811

customer_reviews.title: Noticeably Softer Skin!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great serum. I have used this for about a month, and have noticed significantly smoother skin (which is the northern dry, cold winters is awesome!) and my moisturizer/other products absorb evenly into my skin after using this product in the AM. I have not had any irritation - and I followed the product advice of testing on my wrist prior to use. Some other users have said they don't like that the product feels sticky upon application. In my experience, it is only sticky for about 30 seconds before fully absorbing into my skin. My friends have also complimented me saying that my skin is looking great!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great daily toner/serum to help prevent acne
customer_reviews.text: Asian male with oily skin. Not sure if it makes my skin glow, but it really helps with skin tone and reduces my oil output throughout the day. I apply it in the morning and evening after cleansing. Takes around 6-8 drops to cover my face and it readily absorbs into my skin with no smell or smears. My first bottle lasted approximately 3.5 months. Would highly recommend for those with oily skin to help prevent breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This serum is a part of my daily regimen. It’s the first vitamin with HA so I don’t have a comparison but I read reviews before purchasing so I feel that I got the best product for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: J-lena

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and Fast results!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would've had pictures to show the before and after. My results came within a few days of using this product! I have really bad chin/neck line and neck acne with red and scarring affects. This product has helped to the point I feel comfortable not wearing any make up at all and have minimal looks of acne. I will use this once a day to sometimes twice. I started it out just using it once at night with amazing results right away.
customer_reviews.author: Stefani

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly like it
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually notice much difference when using serums etc. I only use products that are mainly natural (like 90% or above). I've got to say I noticed a little something when using this, so I bought it again. My skin is a bit "brighter". I like that it's mainly natural ingredients- I won't put things on my face/body that I wouldn't be willing to ingest. I'd say give this one a try, it's worth seeing if you like it too...
customer_reviews.author: Melanie J.

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I'm going through this bottle too quickly. I think I got carried away with how much I've been putting on. I got it on prime day and I'm already half way through the bottle ha. Idk maybe it's only a month supply? I will say it definitely absorbes into your skin, which is great. It's not oily or greasy. I have noticed my cheeks looking more plump since I've started using this. I plan on buying it again when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: I love these guys products
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and feels really good on the skin I get it every few months..... people expect unbelievable results in the first few weeks, or wake up with an 8 month old baby skin..lol.. tbh it works for me I use it every other day when my skin feels dry take a bath put it on and my skin feels and looks great in the morning...I have a few of there products and will keep getting them for a long time to come
customer_reviews.author: Javier Velazquez

customer_reviews.title: This serum is amazing! I had switched to a different birth control ...
customer_reviews.text: This serum is amazing! I had switched to a different birth control pill and my face was breaking out constantly! I tried many different products, but this was the only thing that seemed to help keep my skin clear! I use it right when I get out of the shower, wait maybe ten minutes or so and then apply a face lotion. I have noticed such a difference with this product and would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: justmyopinion

customer_reviews.title: I like this product very much and was considering trying some ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this product very much and was considering trying some of your other items. I looked on- line but didn't see an alcohol free toner. And which facial cream do you recommend for the daytime. I live in an extremely dry climate. I use a lighter cream during the day and a vitamin e cream at night. I like using aloe on my face, do you recommend your aloe for the face? Thank you kindly, Sonya
customer_reviews.author: S. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I stumbled upon this product in November when my acne was at its absolute worst. I started using this product and within the first couplr months, I saw drastic results. I use the serum every morning under my moiturizer and my skin finally looks normal again. I still get acne esp around that lovely visitor every month, but its nowhere near what it was. I just ordered my 2nd bottle, but I noticed it has a slightly different smell to it, hope its the same formula.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Improved skin over time
customer_reviews.text: Love! I have been using this serum for almost a year and over time it has drastically reduced my breakouts, oiliness, and skin texture. This serum dries quickly and does not cause any extra oil on face (as a someone with very oily skin I always worry that settings or moisturizers will leave me more oily). Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: L. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.  Will improve skin texture over time.
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic product. I used it every day before moisturizing and have seen a significant difference in my skin texture over a short period of time. It's a viscous fluid that absorbs well - you only need a couple of drops to cover your face, and then wait until it dries before you apply any other products like moisturizers and make up. Make sure you always store vitamin c in a dark, cool area out of the sunlight or it will oxidize and degrade quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Healthy Living

customer_reviews.title: No glow - Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This was very drying. I was expecting it to help make my skin glow (according to all the reviews). I have normal skin and this makes it feel very tight, when dry. It was too drying. If you have oily skin, this may work perfectly for you. If you have dry skin, definitely steer clear of this.
customer_reviews.author: WeekendWarrior2017

customer_reviews.title: Texture too watery and didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I've tried another Vit C Serum prior to Amara's brand. After I ran out I wanted to give this a try. The texture is watery and the bottle finished faster than I expected (less than a month) because of how I was applying it. I felt like I was putting water on my face so kept adding another layer. I ended up going back to my old brand. I didn't see any improvements and it certainly didn't help with what I purchased it for. I won't repurchase again.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Definitely will be repurchasing!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this makes my skin feel. I use it during the day as a serum under my foundation or just on bare skin and finish with a lotion. It leaves a clean finish with no stickiness (I hate that!). I have noticed a decrease in pore size and my dark spots and freckles seem to have diminished. Vitamin C I find to be a more gentile alternative to hydroquinone for dark spots and freckles. It's a little slower but worth the wait!
customer_reviews.author: Nurse_K

customer_reviews.title: Not like the rest
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to vitamin c serum. It is a diamond in the rough. I can say with certainty that it is comparible to paulas choice vitamin c serum at a fraction of the price. It gives your skin a littly heat flush, it isn't oily, it has a good amount of hylauronic acid in it and the delivery is just perfect for absorption. I use this daily, every morning under my sunscreen. Its the perfect addition to my routine. I also swear by this after every derma rolling session, it absorbs and shows instant smoothing and retexturizing the next morning. Try it... the price gives you no reason not to at least give it a test.
customer_reviews.author: B Digital

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it absorbs into my skin and leaves no greasy feel. Goes on smooth. No negative reactions which is a plus for me and my skin which can be sensitive to some products. Not sure about any skin improvements just yet as I've only been using it for about 2 weeks. Probably should have taken a before pic.
customer_reviews.author: CCRTAGT

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far!
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far. Bought in conjunction with a derma roller. I have dry skin, so I am only using this every other day, as it further dried out my skin. I had a large pimple forming the day before a job interview, this serum dissolved it by 95% by morning! And was completely gone within 2 days. Love it so far! I'm hoping it helps with a few dark sun freckles on my cheeks, I will update my review with pics in a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: NJLyn

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I’ve use multiple vitC serums and this one is the least effective. The consistency is very watery and runny. VitC serums typically have a tackiness to it. I don’t have problematic skin, but it is prone to dryness. This did nothing for brightening, moisture, & evening out texture. The tree of life or truskin vitC serums on Amazon work better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Iris Lam

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: I try this a few times only. And when I got this it felt more like water than a serum compared to the other serum I have bought. I only gave it one star because I read how it had a product that was banned from Japan. Do research frist. But I didn't like it.
customer_reviews.author: josie

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I love this serum. I apply it at night after washing my face and then apply a moisturizer. I experienced a little dryness on my chin in the beginning but my skin quickly became used to this and now it is so soft and smooth. My brown spots have significantly gotten lighter as well.
customer_reviews.author: PositiveSerendipity

customer_reviews.title: Terrible for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to this product working for me as other customers had stated in reviews but have been very disappointed instead. It was difficult to apply, even on damp skin (which would be the minimum requirement to apply otherwise you couldn't rub it in at all), it actually was drying to my skin and it made me break out. Will not purchase again. Obviously some ingredients in this product are irritating to sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... the moisturizer for about 2 weeks and I really like them both
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about a month and the moisturizer for about 2 weeks and I really like them both. I have not noticed any fading of my age spots which is disappointing, but I really do like the way these products make my skin feel. I will definitely keep using them and have ordered some others to try. Thanks Amara for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Like anything (like the gym) it takes times to see ...
customer_reviews.text: I️ REALLY did see the difference using this!! Like anything (like the gym) it takes times to see the results and dedication to wash face and put on but it really works. I️ have a lot of red acne spots and this has really helped tone them down.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene M.

customer_reviews.title: A great product.
customer_reviews.text: On the advice of my doctor, I've been using a Vitamin C serum on my face for twenty years now. This is the first time I used the Amara Organics brand and I will continue to use it. It has a light, moisturizing texture and feels good on the face. I still have spots and wrinkles but I'd be surprised if any product actually works on that. However, I know that the Vitamin C is good for my skin and am more than happy with this particular brand. And the price is right!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: This serum has a wonderful, light consistency that quickly absorbs into my skin. I use it during the day and at night before moisturizing. I have sensitive skin and have no issues or flare ups using it. I haven't noticed a major difference since I began using it but I like the way it makes my skin feel and I am hoping to notice a different after using it longer. Bottom line, this is a wonderful product at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Ziomatra

customer_reviews.title: Great product! I wish it was a thicker consistency
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I wish it was a thicker consistency, I'm going through it like water ( no pun intended) . It has cleared some fine lines and facial discoloration. A little pricey for me to keep using, I'm 50 and at this rate it's going to be a monthly purchase . But I do love the product!
customer_reviews.author: Kaybee

customer_reviews.title: Great Serum
customer_reviews.text: I just picked up my third bottle of this serum, it is the first product I've used in a long time that I find myself repurchasing. It has really helped with acne scars on my face and other scars on my body. I highly recommend this serum to anyone who is learning about skin care and figuring out a routine, it works very well and is reasonably priced. I am thinking about adding more of their products into my skin care routine.
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Feels fine on the face, but no discernable improvements after regular use
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this pretty regularly since I bought it. While it feels fine when applied to the face, I really can't tell any difference or improvement on all the things it mentions in the description (fading age spots, brightening skin, etc). It certainly doesn't do anything bad, but I was hoping for more apparent positive results.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Y.

customer_reviews.title: This one is not for me
customer_reviews.text: I decided to add Vitamin C serum to my nightly routine. I have only used a couple of serums so I don't have much experience with them. I have a couple of small sun spots and some discoloration but not severe. I am not sure how long it takes to fade them but didn't notice a difference. (I wear SPF 50 moisturizer on my face and neck every day.) I used a full dropper to cover my face and neck because it doesn't spread easily. I didn't like the way it felt on my skin after applying, like a drying film on my face.
customer_reviews.author: ALB

customer_reviews.title: Great product!  Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I've just finished my first bottle of this serum. It lasted me 2 1/2 months. I use it daily on my face, neck, decolletage, arms and hands. I've seen much improvement in my skin's appearance in terms of fine lines, fading of sun spots and overall glow. I just turned 50 and used to go to a tanning salon, so it says quite a lot about how effective this serum is, that I've been asked multiple times in the last month what my secret is! It's a wonderful and very reasonably priced product and I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: KC Sales & Services

customer_reviews.title: Not good, caused serious breakouts
customer_reviews.text: This product caused major breakouts on me. I have combination skin, but on the areas it was causing breakout is where I’m normally dry. Tried to work with it too long and now I’m passed my return period. Money down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Desi Santana

customer_reviews.title: Love this Vitamin C Serum
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this Vitamin C Serum for a couple of years now and I am very happy with it. I use it at night before my Amara Retinol Cream. The combination of both Amara products has definitely lightened some brown spots I had. I am very pleased with Amara products and you can't beat their prices either... I will continue to use these products!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy D.

customer_reviews.title: I've been using this serum for about 6 months, ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this serum for about 6 months, while I haven't noticed a reduction in wrinkles, I have noticed that some of my scars and dark spots are diminished and my skin breaks out less severely and less often and heals quicker. I plan on continuing to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Use regularly and wow!
customer_reviews.text: Re-discovered this and after cleansing your face each morning/night you’ll be mighty surprised if you use this diligently on your aged skin. Good product for an old blond(70) that lives beachside. Amazing. True.
customer_reviews.author: Merryland

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: After adding this serum to my skincare routine, my skin changed completely. Everyone compliments my skin on having "a glow". LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Anaelle Seide

customer_reviews.title: Important part of my beauty routine
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I bought one Vitamin C serum a few months ago and now I am a half way on my second bottle. I put it on my face every morning before my face cream and make up and my skin looks so healthy, fresh, glowing and young. This serum is an important part of my beauty routine now. I am going to buy more of this product soon.
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Hmmm
customer_reviews.text: I actually did not see any difference in my skin after using up the entire bottle. I wonder if I used it incorrectly (or not if enough) or if the product just wasn't right for me? I still interested in Vitamin C products tho and will try another brand next time.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a Vitamin C moisturizing serum that I can use up before it goes bad!
customer_reviews.text: Vitamin C really works but it can be expensive, especially if it's not used before it how's bad. I've read that old Vitamin C can actually be bad to use, therefore it really is very important to use it up and store it correctly. This stuff is great. I give it five stars😘
customer_reviews.author: ba p mitchell

customer_reviews.title: An amazing product-
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several Vitamin C serums with hyaluronic acid and this is by far the best. It also makes THE best makeup primer, no "sliding" makeup, no huge pores...it just helps your foundation look flawless.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda

customer_reviews.title: Really bad product
customer_reviews.text: I used for almost a year the retinol from this brand and loved it! So I decided to give a try to this vitamin C serum. Terrible product. It dries out my face skin pretty bad. Also, my skin feels itchy and becomes red after applying this product. I trashed it. It's doesn't feel good for the skin.
customer_reviews.author: nina1984
